data.comment: The big names in today's match at Dignity Health Sports Park have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 1, Seattle are caught offside.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Jair Marrufo signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in Seattle's half.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Cristian Roldan (Seattle) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Jair Marrufo awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Seattle in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Seattle push upfield but Jair Marrufo quickly pulls them for offside.
Can LA Galaxy capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seattle's half?
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Seattle's Nicolas Lodeiro gets in a shot on goal at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Seattle take a 0-1 lead thanks to Cristian Roldan.
Jordan Morris instrumental with a fine assist.
LA Galaxy are coming forward and Julian Araujo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 14, Seattle have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Seattle in the half of LA Galaxy.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in LA Galaxy.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Carson.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the home team in Carson.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
In the minute 22, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
In the minute 30, Seattle to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Seattle close to the penalty box.
Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 33, In Carson, LA Galaxy push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for LA Galaxy, close to Seattle's area.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Seattle extend their lead to 0-2 through Jordan Morris.
In the minute 38, That's a fine assist from Nicolas Lodeiro.
Jair Marrufo signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in Seattle's half.
Julian Araujo (LA Galaxy) has received a yellow card from Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 41, LA Galaxy pushes forward through Chicharito, whose finish on goal is saved.
LA Galaxy drives forward and Chicharito gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
LA Galaxy are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 42, Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
The first-half is over at Dignity Health Sports Park.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 48, LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Jair Marrufo awards Seattle a goal kick.
Sebastian Lletget for LA Galaxy drives towards goal at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 50, LA Galaxy's Sebastian Lletget attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Seattle have a goal kick.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 51, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Jair Marrufo awards Seattle a goal kick.
LA Galaxy make their first substitution with Efrain Alvarez replacing Julian Araujo.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Seattle in the half of LA Galaxy.
Seattle drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
In the minute 56, Seattle to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
Ball safe as LA Galaxy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Carson.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
Goal! Cristian Roldan extends Seattle's lead to 0-3.
In the minute 61, Great play from Joao Paulo to set up the goal.
Throw-in high up the field for Seattle in Carson.
In Carson Seattle drive forward through Will Bruin. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Jair Marrufo signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in Seattle's half.
In the minute 69, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Alex Roldan is replacing Kelvin Leerdam for the away team.
Bradley Shaun Smith is on a sub for Will Bruin for Seattle.
In the minute 71, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Seattle needs to be cautious. LA Galaxy have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 75, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Carson.
Perry Kitchen is replacing Joe Corona for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 78, The home team replace Emiliano Insua with Diedie Traore.
Shane O'Neill is replacing Yeimar Gomez Andrade for the away team.
In the minute 79, Brian Schmetzer is making the team's third substitution at Dignity Health Sports Park with Jordy Delem replacing Gustav Svensson.
Attention is being given to Seattle’s Nouhou Tolo and play has been suspended briefly.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 82, It seems as if Nouhou Tolo is unable to continue. Miguel Ibarra replaces him for the away team.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 84, At Dignity Health Sports Park, LA Galaxy are penalized for being offside.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Goal! A headed strike from the home team reduces their deficit to 1-3. Sebastian Lletget got above everyone else to nod it in.
In the minute 88, Rolf Feltscher with an assist there.
Gordon Wild is on a sub for Sebastian Lletget for LA Galaxy.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Jordan Morris hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Carson for Seattle.
Seattle are whistled for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 1-3.
